text:
In a letter to PM @narendramodi, #Chhattisgarh CM @bhupeshbaghel said that Chhattisgarh is a tribal-dominated state, therefore free of cost #COVID19 #vaccine should be made available in the state on priority basis in the firstphase itself: Chief Minister'sOffice
 @ChhattisgarhCMO https://t.co/a0PKsrYeBk
